players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "With Alice dead, there’s 1 mafia among Bob/Charlie/Diana. I’m a villager. Detective, if you have a guilty, claim now; otherwise stay quiet. Bob and Charlie: where were your heads last night? Any reads?"

Charlie: "I’m a villager. Diana’s approach makes sense: if the Detective has a hard guilty, claim now; otherwise, don’t out. My gut: Bob felt oddly passive in setup talk yesterday; Diana feels towny for prompting."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I’m the Detective; I investigated him last night and got a guilty. Diana, please vote Charlie with me."

Charlie: "Bob is fake-claiming. If he were real, mafia would night-kill him immediately; yet he’s alive and tunneling me. Diana, don’t quick-vote—let’s force Bob to explain why he didn’t check the swingier slot."

You: "Charlie is confirmed mafia from my investigation. He’s attacking process to avoid the result. Mafia didn’t kill me because he drew the kill—there’s only 1 mafioso. Diana, lock it in: vote Charlie."

Diana: "Bob, full claim: who would you have checked if not Charlie and why? Charlie, if Bob is scum, walk me through his win path after a D1 fake-guilty. Also, both of you: exact night kill reasoning?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
